title: Face with Spiral Eyes
description:
A face with spiral-shaped eyes, commonly used to indicate dizziness, but may also represent hypnosis or other forms of disorientation.

Created in 2020 disambiguate from the ğŸ˜µ Face with Crossed-Out Eyes emoji which previously displayed spiral eyes on some platforms, but X eyes on others. This emoji will consistently show spiral eyes on all platforms.

Unlike other vendors, Huawei's design features a ğŸ’« Dizzy symbol atop this emoji's head.
apple_vendor_description: This captivating emoji on Apple devices presents a face with large, concentric spirals for eyes, rendered in a captivating electric blue hue that seems to hypnotize. The smooth gradients and gentle 3D effect give the face a slightly dazed or mesmerized expression, a hallmark of Apple's expressive character designs. Itâ€™s perfectly suited for conveying feelings of being spellbound, disoriented, overwhelmed, or utterly captivated by something.
